intro: Myosotis granulosa, commonly known as the granulate forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to South America. It is characterized by its small, blue or purple flowers and hairy, lance-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks.
